bib.title: Automatic prompt system in the process of mapping plWordNet on Princeton WordNet
bib.author: K{\k{e}}dzia, Pawe{\l} and Piasecki, Maciej and Rudnicka, Ewa and Przybycie{\'n}, Konrad
bib.abstract: The paper offers a critical evaluation of the power and usefulness of an automatic prompt system based on the extended Relaxation Labelling algorithm in the process of (manual) mapping plWordNet on Princeton WordNet. To this end the results of manual mapping–that is inter-lingual relations between plWN and PWN synsets–are juxtaposed with the automatic prompts that were generated for the source language synsets to be mapped. We check the number and type of inter-lingual relations introduced on the basis of automatic prompts and
